# Load libraries
```{r}
library(knitr)
library(rmdformats)
```


```{r, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
library("MuMIn")
library(lmtest)
library(boot)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
WScore_affect <- lmer(W_score~ scale(A_score) + scale(F_score) + (1|Participant) + (1|Trailer), data = AllSubs_NeuralActivation)
summary(WScore_affect)
r.squaredGLMM(WScore_affect)
```

Individual view percent ~ Onset neural activity

```{r, echo = FALSE}
WScore_affect_NAo <- lmer(W_score~ scale(A_score) + scale(F_score) + (NAcc_onset) + (AIns_onset) +
                            (MPFC_onset) + (1|Participant) + (1|Trailer), data=AllSubs_NeuralActivation)
summary(WScore_affect_NAo)
r.squaredGLMM(WScore_affect_NAo)
```
